tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sales_meetings (
    meeting_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_date TIMESTAMP,
    customer_id UUID,
    sales_rep_id UUID,
    meeting_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE scheduled_calls (
    call_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    call_date TIMESTAMP,
    customer_id UUID,
    sales_rep_id UUID,
    call_purpose VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE SalesMeetings (
    meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    time TIME,
    location TEXT,
    customer_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Demos (
    demo_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    time TIME,
    location TEXT,
    customer_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Calls (
    call_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    time TIME,
    customer_id INT,
    employee_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE SalesMeetings (
  meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  meeting_date DATE NOT NULL,
  meeting_time TIME NOT NULL,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  sales_rep_id INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Demos (
  demo_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  demo_date DATE NOT NULL,
  demo_time TIME NOT NULL,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  sales_rep_id INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Calls (
  call_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  call_date DATE NOT NULL,
  call_time TIME NOT NULL,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  sales_rep_id INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE SharedCalendar (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_date DATE NOT NULL,
  event_time TIME NOT NULL,
  event_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  attendee_id INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE SalesMeetings (
  meeting_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  meeting_date TIMESTAMP,
  meeting_description TEXT,
  customer_id UUID,
  sales_rep_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE Demos (
  demo_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  demo_date TIMESTAMP,
  demo_description TEXT,
  customer_id UUID,
  sales_rep_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE Calls (
  call_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  call_date TIMESTAMP,
  call_duration INT,
  customer_id UUID,
  sales_rep_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE Calendar (
  event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  event_type TEXT,
  event_start TIMESTAMP,
  event_end TIMESTAMP,
  customer_id UUID,
  sales_rep_id UUID
);
